verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H3068"\w* end, \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* David,

When Nathan \w the|strong="H0430"\w* \w prophet|strong="H0430"\w* came \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H0430"\w* after \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w had|strong="H0430"\w* sinned \w with|strong="H0430"\w* Bethsabee.

\w Have|strong="H0398"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, according \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w great|strong="H3966"\w* mercy. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* according \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy tender mercies blot \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* iniquity.

Wash \w me|strong="H0413"\w* yet more \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H7121"\w* iniquity, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* cleanse \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H7121"\w* sin.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* know \w my|strong="H5921"\w* iniquity, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* sin is always \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w To|strong="H0430"\w* thee only \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* sinned, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* done evil \w before|strong="H0430"\w* thee: \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou mayst \w be|strong="H0430"\w* justified \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy words \w and|strong="H0430"\w* mayst overcome \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w judged|strong="H8199"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* behold \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* conceived \w in|strong="H0430"\w* iniquities; \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* sins did \w my|strong="H8085"\w* mother conceive \w me|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w behold|strong="H3808"\w* thou hast loved truth: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* uncertain \w and|strong="H2077"\w* hidden \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H2077"\w* thy wisdom thou hast made manifest \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Thou shalt sprinkle \w me|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* hyssop, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* cleansed: thou shalt wash \w me|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H3947"\w* whiter \w than|strong="H3808"\w* snow.

\w To|strong="H0929"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* hearing thou shalt \w give|strong="H2416"\w* joy \w and|strong="H0929"\w* gladness: \w and|strong="H0929"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bones \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* humbled \w shall|strong="H0929"\w* rejoice.

Turn \w away|strong="H3605"\w* thy face \w from|strong="H2022"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* sins, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* blot \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* iniquities.

Create \w a|strong="H3588"\w* clean heart \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w O|strong="H0518"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w*: \w and|strong="H8398"\w* renew \w a|strong="H3588"\w* right spirit within \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bowels.

Cast \w me|strong="H0398"\w* \w not|strong="H0398"\w* \w away|strong="H0398"\w* \w from|strong="H0398"\w* thy face; \w and|strong="H0398"\w* take \w not|strong="H0398"\w* thy holy spirit \w from|strong="H0398"\w* \w me|strong="H0398"\w*.
Restore unto me \w the|strong="H2076"\w* joy \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy salvation, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* strengthen me \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H2076"\w* perfect spirit.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* teach \w the|strong="H3117"\w* unjust thy ways: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* wicked \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* converted \w to|strong="H3117"\w* thee.

Deliver \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* blood, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* salvation: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* tongue \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* extol thy justice.
\w O|strong="H0859"\w* Lord, thou wilt open \w my|strong="H0310"\w* lips: \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H0310"\w* mouth \w shall|strong="H1697"\w* declare thy praise.

\w For|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou hadst desired sacrifice, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* would \w indeed|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* given \w it|strong="H0518"\w*: \w with|strong="H5973"\w* burnt offerings thou wilt \w not|strong="H0518"\w* be delighted.

\w A|strong="H7971"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w is|strong="H3956"\w* \w an|strong="H7971"\w* afflicted spirit: \w a|strong="H7971"\w* contrite \w and|strong="H7971"\w* humbled heart, O \w God|strong="H7971"\w*, thou wilt not despise.

Deal favourably, O Lord, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thy good \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* Sion; \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* walls \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* built \w up|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* shalt thou accept \w the|strong="H1961"\w* sacrifice \w of|strong="H5869"\w* justice, oblations \w and|strong="H5869"\w* whole burnt offerings: \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H0428"\w* \w they|strong="H0428"\w* \w lay|strong="H1961"\w* calves \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* thy altar.
